message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I believe I can find something similar elsewhere for a lower price. I would like to propose a price of $95 for your product.
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $100 for your product, which is my maximum budget.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I would like to stick to my budget and propose a final price of $100 for your product.
I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $105, Bob. I'm not budging from that price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105, but that's as low as I can go.
